definition.name: Azure Machine Learning Compute Action
definition.description: Connect to or create a Compute Target to your Azure Machine Learning Workspace with this GitHub Action
definition.author: azure/gh-aml

inputs.name: azure_credentials
inputs.description: Paste output of `az ad sp create-for-rbac --name <your-sp-name> --role contributor --scopes /subscriptions/<your-subscriptionId>/resourceGroups/<your-rg> --sdk-auth` as value of secret variable: AZURE_CREDENTIALS

inputs.name: parameters_file
inputs.description: JSON file including the parameters of the compute.

evidence.reasoning: The action is primarily focused on connecting to or creating compute resources in Azure, which falls under Infrastructure. It also requires Azure credentials for authentication, making Authentication a relevant secondary category.
